sentences: Magnar Mangersnes (born 31 October 1938) is a Norwegian organist and choral conductor.
He graduated as teacher in 1962, and from the Bergen Musikkonservatorium in 1966.
From 1971 he was assigned Organist and Master of the Choristers (Norwegian: domkantor) in the Bergen Cathedral.
He established and conducted the choir Bergen Domkantori from 1971.
He has conducted a number of choirs in the Bergen district, and received several awards, including Griegprisen in 1985.
He was decorated Knight, First Class of the Order of St. Olav in 2000.
